an10.121:1.1: “Suriyassa, bhikkhave, udayato etam pubbangamam etam pubbanimittam, yadidam—arunuggam.
an10.121:1.2: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, kusalanam dhammanam etam pubbangamam etam pubbanimittam, yadidam—sammaditthi.
an10.121:1.3: Sammaditthikassa, bhikkhave, sammasankappo pahoti, sammasankappassa sammavaca pahoti, sammavacassa sammakammanto pahoti, sammakammantassa sammaajivo pahoti, sammaajivassa sammavayamo pahoti, sammavayamassa sammasati pahoti, sammasatissa sammasamadhi pahoti, sammasamadhissa sammananam pahoti, sammananissa sammavimutti pahoti”ti.
